excerpt.rendered:
From an American Oak Sherry cask, this Exceptional Single Cask from The Macallan is the 2018, cask 9 ( #3890). This is vintage 1988, aged for 30 years and finally bottled at natural cask strength of 51.7% abv. As compared to the regular 30 year old, this single cask represents one of the best single casks Macallan has to offer. Only 130 such bottles exist for this making it truly a rare unicorn in the ESC range.

ESC 2018/ESB-14/09
Cask Type: American Oak Sherry
Distilled: 26th April 1988
Bottled: 16th October 2018
One of 130 bottles

Cask number #3890

Distillery : Macallan
Age : 30
Vintage : 1988
ABV : 51.70%
